Dive into Deep Learning.html.title: Dive into Deep Learning
Dive into Deep Learning.html.body: Linear Regression def synthetic_data(w,b,examples): #在这里 x=torch.normal(0,1,(num_examples,len(w))) y=torch.matmul(X,w)+b y+=torch.normal(0,0.01,y.shape) return X,y.reshape((-1,1))
